ComicInfo.Title: Awakening II - Part 6
ComicInfo.Summary:
“AWAKENINGS II,” Part Six
Conclusion. Strands come together, the Hand of Glory has been lit, Alex has made a deal with the witch hunters, and the face of Rowan's enemy is revealed, with damning consequences.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Nicola Scott & Eric Trautmann | 1 | | B | Cover B | Leandro Fernandez | 2 |
